description:
At the battle of Kanegasaki, the Oda clan suffered a huge loss and the Asakura clan had a huge victory. Since the Azai clan sided with the Asakura clan, Nagamasa tells Oichi that he will divorce her since she is Oda Nobunaga’s little sister. However, Oichi decides to stay with Nagamasa and the Azai clan.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Avec mon seigneur pour la vie
